typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Base
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system base annotations.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.ReferenceTarget
typeDescription.description: A target type for the referent property, such that entities pointing to the same target are assumed to be coreferences. The target can therefore be thought of as a super-entity, though it has no properties or value of it's own. The span of this entity is taken to be the scope in which this reference target is valid.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.Base
typeDescription.description: Base annotation with confidence and annotator properties.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence value between 0 and 1 from annotation processor.

featureDescription.name: referent
featureDescription.description: Can be used to link a corefence to an entity to another (presuambly more definitive) mention of the same entity elsewhere in the text.

typeDescription.name: uima.tcas.DocumentAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Overriding the base DocumentAnntation to add additional features. The JCasGen code generated from this annotation replaces the default type in uima-document-annotation.jar (which should be removed from the classpath).

featureDescription.name: sourceUri
featureDescription.description: A URI representing the source of the document

featureDescription.name: timestamp
featureDescription.description: The time at which the document was processed

featureDescription.name: documentClassification
featureDescription.description: The security classification of the document

featureDescription.name: documentCaveats
featureDescription.description: An array of string values specifying handling caveats for the document.

featureDescription.name: documentReleasability
featureDescription.description: Array of country designators to which the document is releasable.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.BaleenAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A base class for annotations used by Baleen. Includes things like an internal ID and a function to generate an external ID.

featureDescription.name: internalId
featureDescription.description: An ID that is used internally to refer to the entity

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.Pointer
typeDescription.description: A pointer to another annotation in the same document. Designed for general use (eg temporary working inside annotator) rather than having some specific semantic meaning (eg like coreference).

featureDescription.name: target
featureDescription.description: At target annotation to which this pointer refers.

featureDescription.name: targetId
featureDescription.description: Used to reference a (Baleen) annotation by its internal id. Useful for if you are pointing to a different jCas (in which case you can't use target)
